physical_appearance:The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features three toddlers. Two of them are sitting on the floor while the other one is squatting. The toddler on the left is looking in the direction where the photograph was captured. He is also holding a bowl in his left hand. The feet of an adult can be seen
 only slightly
 at the extreme left hand side of the photograph. The background of the photograph suggests that it was taken in the interior of a building.

metadata.title_text: Toddlers at play Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
metadata.physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features three toddlers. Two of them are sitting on the floor while the other one is squatting. The toddler on the left is looking in the direction where the photograph was captured. He is also holding a bowl in his left hand. The feet of an adult can be seen, only slightly, at the extreme left hand side of the photograph. The background of the photograph suggests that it was taken in the interior of a building.
